txt.en:
'Not long after the boy left, we had a terrible storm. The lightning frightened the horses, and they bolted, knocking the gates down and fleeing into the plains.

'Now is the time to gather the horses back up. They are prone to flight, and you will need to ride them back in if you want them to get here in time.

'You can find them all over the moors, grazing. We should not need more than a few to get back up and running.'
'This is wonderful. Now that we have horses, I can renew the stable's business. Is there anywhere you would like to go?'
'We only need a few horses to renew the stable. Bring them back in quick, though.'
The stables of Avardin have been in turmoil as of late. Lack of money, supplies, and storms have all contributed to the stables being shuttered.
Horses can be found in the fields surrounding Avardin.\n\nLevelha asked you to find and ride back several horses.
Levelha is in Avardin, in the central Starkmoor.\n\nLevelha will be pleased to hear that you have brought him several horses.
